title: Ben Stevenson (rugby union)
text:
Benjamin Thomas Stevenson (born 19 July 1998) is an <a href="England">English</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who plays for <a href="Newcastle%20Falcons">Newcastle Falcons</a> in <a href="Premiership%20Rugby">Premiership Rugby</a>.
A former pupil of <a href="Yarm%20School">Yarm</a>, Stevenson completed a law degree at <a href="Durham%20University">Durham University</a> in 2019.
